A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Simply put\, the writing in Hollywood these days are dead. They can't even make a franchise interesting\, let alone writing something original. The personality of all these new characters are so one dimensional that everything lacks wisdom. This totally betrayed the memory of the original Star Wars series. I hope they don't produce any more Star Wars movie until they find a writer who is as witty as George R.R. Martin.
